parameters.name: LogCode
parameters.description: The log code of the cloud service, such as the code of the process log for Security Center. You can obtain the log code from the response of the ListDelivery operation.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description:
The code of the cloud service. Valid values:

*   qcloud_waf
*   qlcoud_cfw
*   hcloud_waf
*   hcloud_cfw
*   ddos
*   sas
*   cfw
*   config
*   csk
*   fc
*   rds
*   nas
*   apigateway
*   cdn
*   mongodb
*   eip
*   slb
*   vpc
*   actiontrail
*   waf
*   bastionhost
*   oss
*   polardb

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the data management center of the threat analysis feature resides. Specify this parameter based on the region where your assets reside. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: Your assets reside in regions in China.
*   ap-southeast-1: Your assets reside in regions outside China.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The ID of the account that you switch from the management account.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The type of the view. Valid values:
- 0: the current Alibaba Cloud account
- 1: the global account
